original_text: Then Samuel took a suckling lamb and sacrificed it as a whole burnt offering to the Lord. He cried out to the Lord on Israel’s behalf, and the Lord answered him.
korean_text: 사무엘이 젖 먹는 어린 양 하나를 가져다가 온전한 번제를 여호와께 드리고 이스라엘을 위하여 여호와께 부르짖으매 여호와께서 응답하셨더라

sentences.original_text: Then Samuel took a suckling lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사무엘은 젖 먹는 어린 양을 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and sacrificed it as a whole burnt offering to the Lord
He cried out to the Lord on Israel's behalf
